name: jakarta
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Indonesia, in the western part of the island of Java: Jakarta's wealthier residents from affected suburbs checked into hotels across the city of 10 million people. Her father is a diplomat in Jakarta.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Jakarta the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Jakarta.His mother married an Indonesian foreign student and the family moved to Jakarta.A disagreement led to the closure of the company's Jakarta branch.
